articles.title: DPRK NDC Policy Department Warns Park Geun Hye and Her Group against Their Sophism
articles.content:
DPRK NDC Policy Department Warns Park Geun Hye and Her Group against Their Sophism
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Such anachronistic and treacherous acts of Park Geun Hye and her group as clinging to the coattails of foreign forces, their backs turned on the nation, would only result in wringing their necks. A spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission said this in a statement Thursday.
					 He served the following warning to them:
					
					 They should not dare utter words about the nukes of the DPRK and its line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force any longer.
					
					 They should not behave impudently in a bid to lead someone to "changes".
					
					 If Park wants to build confidence and receive the treatment as "head of state," she should come to her senses and properly behave.
					
					 Their vociferous talking about those matters as dictated by their American master would only add to the thrice-cursed crimes committed by them as sycophants and traitors and maniacs keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 They should know well that no one is more miserable than those political servants dancing to the tune of others, bereft of their own senses.
					
					 Park should know that genuine confidence can be built only when she respects all the north-south joint declarations and agreements reached according to them, common achievements of the nation, before grumbling about someone's  "breaking of promise" and good treatment would be accorded only when she stops deliberately speaking ill of someone.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK NDC Policy Department Condemns Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK NDC Policy Department Condemns Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission in a statement released on Thursday blasted the reckless remarks again made by Park Geun Hye of south Korea crying out for the DPRK's "dismantlement of nukes" during her trips to West European countries.
					 He said;
					
					 Independent defence capability including nukes and missiles built by the DPRK tightening belt serves as a treasure common to the Koreans who live in the north and the south and abroad and thanks to this, the Korean nation  lives on this land free from war and disputes.
					
					 Nukes and missiles of the DPRK serve as strong forces deterring the U.S. from inflicting a nuclear disaster upon the former and treasured swords for self-defence to protect the destiny of the country and compatriots.
					
					 Sovereignty and dignity are dearer than the destiny of a nation.
					
					 In this sense, the demand that the DPRK should dismantle its nukes and missiles is, in the final analysis, little short of forcing it to give up its sovereignty and dignity to be a slave of imperialism.
					
					 It is none other than Park Geun Hye who is coquettishly welcoming the U.S. when introducing nukes and missiles to pose constant danger of war to the Korean Peninsula and shouting herself hoarse for the elimination of the DPRK's self-defensive treasured sword for ensuring peace and security of the nation.
					
					 Park is a perfect copy of her father. It was the foreign forces with which she got familiar first after her birth and it was the sycophantic and treacherous disposition that she inherited from her father.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK NDC Policy Department Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Rubbish about "Change of North"
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK NDC Policy Department Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Rubbish about "Change of North"
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) in a statement on Thursday ridiculed rubbish talked by Park Geun Hye of south Korea about the DPRK's "right option" and "genuine change". 
					 He said: 
					
					 What the DPRK wishes for is by no means the U.S.-style market economy based on showy U.S.-style democracy or logic of jungle law.
					
					 The road to be covered by the DPRK is the one characterized by its independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in defence, the path of giving top priority to the interests of the nation.
					
					 It is the most right option and genuine change desired by all compatriots to map out policies as required by the road and carry out them in practice.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK as ever independently settle the issues related to the north-south relations on the principle of placing the nation above all and attaching importance to it.
					
					 Park's reckless remarks urging the DPRK to take "right option" are little short of pressurizing it to follow the same way as the sycophants and traitors did when leaving south Korea to the tender mercy of robber U.S. They are nothing but a foolish demand for taking the same road of treachery as what south Korea covered while frantically pursuing confrontation with compatriots, permanent national split and cooperation with foreign forces. 
					
					 It is none other than Park Geun Hye who should make a right option and work for genuine change.
					
					 Crabs in mud are bound to move sideways. It is impossible for Park Geun Hye to change her character as a dictator as she is steeped in "yusin" to the marrow of her bones. 
					
					 It is shameless, indeed, for her to express hope for "changes" in the DPRK vigorously advancing under the banner of Songun. 
					
					 The word "change" is appropriate for Park Geun Hye who took the "presidential office" through an election coup by dint of strong-arm tactics and a string of gimmicks and desperately pursues "yusin" and dictatorship.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK NDC Policy Department Discloses Park Geun Hye's True Colors as Sycophant
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK NDC Policy Department Discloses Park Geun Hye's True Colors as Sycophant
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) released a statement on Thursday disclosing the true colors of Park Geun Hye of south Korea as a despicable sycophant and traitor and maniac keen on confrontation with compatriots.
					 Prior to her trip to West European countries, she even talked about "north-south summit" in a bid to improve her image. However, this only revealed her vulgar personality, the statement said.
					
					 It was disgusting indeed for her to speak English and French with much effort in the UK and France, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Park made "speeches" in poor foreign languages as she was steeped in such idea of slavish submission to the marrow of her bones that she should obey and please big countries under any circumstances.
					
					 She, bereft of national identity to say nothing of elementary dignity as a politician, donned dresses not suited to her position. Her behavior during her foreign trips was reminiscent of a poodle.
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than trying to find even a shred of independent stance in her as she is kowtowing to foreign forces but enforcing brutal "yusin" dictatorship inside south Korea, turning it into mayhem and regarding fellow countrymen as a principal enemy and a target of confrontation and war.
					
					 She pledged not to rule out even a war to cope with "provocation" from someone, kowtowing to her American master. This makes it clear that Park and her group are waiting for a chance to launch a war after working out a dangerous scenario for confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 Park is the root cause of all disasters on this land as she is always going into extremes.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation Calls for Reform of UNESCO
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation Calls for Reform of UNESCO
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The head of the DPRK delegation made a speech at the 37th General Conference of the UN Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) on November 9.
					 He said that the idea clarified in the UNESCO Charter is to build a peaceful world free from war and achieve prosperity and development common to humankind based on the intellectual and moral unity and cooperation.
					
					 The idea has not yet been realized though the first decade of the 21st century already passed, he noted.
					
					 To reform the UNESCO is an urgent matter in the efforts to attain the main targets of its activities in the new century and in the changed circumstances, he said, and went on:
					
					 The UNESCO should be reformed in such a way as to fully maintain its international leadership ability and steadily ensure independence and intrinsic character as intellectual organization.
					
					 The issue of education, the top priority in the UNESCO activities, takes a very important place in achieving the world peace, prosperity common to humankind and sustained development.
					
					 The discussion of the General Conference on the preparatory stage for setting up the goal of the education development after 2015 should attach importance to the issue of setting up the realistic stage-by-stage goal for developing the secondary and higher education on the basis of the strengthened primary education and the issue of boosting aid to developing countries. And the discussion on practical measures for carrying them out should be expected.
					
					 The UNESCO should direct greater efforts to activities for ensuring the cultural diversity through dialogue and cooperation between cultures and between religions and promoting mutual understanding and friendship between countries and regions.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever boost the cooperative relations with the UNESCO and all its member nations in the idea of its external policy -- independence, peace and friendship -- and positively join in the international efforts for the world peace and prosperity common to humankind.

articles.title: U.S. Deprived of Right to Vote in UNESCO
articles.content:
U.S. Deprived of Right to Vote in UNESCO
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The UNESCO recently deprived the U.S. of its right to vote in the body. 
					 This was the just and decisive step taken by the UNESCO against the U.S. denial of paying its contribution as a member nation since 2011 as retaliation against the body's approval of Palestine's membership. 
					
					 As soon as the step of the UNESCO was announced, a spokesperson for the U.S. Department of State said that Washington intends to continue its engagement with the UN agency "in every possible way," and President Barack Obama remains committed to seeking Congressional approval for making continued payments to UN agencies that accepted Palestine a member state. 
					
					 It was calculation of the U.S. that the UNESCO dared not deprive it of the right to vote in consideration of the face of "the world's only superpower." It has become a laughing stock of world people as the situation developed to such pass. 
					
					 The behavior of the U.S. is quite understandable as it seceded from the UNESCO in the 1980s in protest against the body's failure to follow Washington's will but it reentered the body in 2003, lost to shame. 
					
					 Deplorable is the position of the U.S. in the UNESCO as it has no right to vote. 
					
					 Sure enough, concerns and grievances were heard from the U.S. administration. 
					
					 Finally, the U.S. has found itself in such poor situation as it tried to force the UNESCO to follow its will. 
					
					 Gone are days never to return when the U.S. could ride roughshod in the international arena. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to behave itself in the international community, awake from the anachronistic daydream of "the world's only superpower.

articles.title: Tunnels along Manpho-Hyesan Railroad Reconstructed
articles.content:
Tunnels along Manpho-Hyesan Railroad Reconstructed
 Manpho, November 15 (KCNA) -- Reconstruction of tunnels along the Manpho-Hyesan railroad came to an end in a little more than four months in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, paving a way for finishing the northern railway reconstruction project ahead of schedule.
					 The reconstruction of tunnels needed much effort, but the members of the youth shock brigade devotedly worked for its completion. 
					
					 The headquarters of the shock brigade made a proper disposition of labor force and meticulously organized the project, while putting the supply of materials and equipment ahead of others.
					
					 Through the socialist emulation campaign, members of the shock brigade finished plastering of tunnel walls by the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (July 27, 1953).
					
					 They displayed a high degree of enthusiasm in carrying out the project for plastering of ceilings. They invented new methods of formwork to save time, thus speeding up concrete tamping.
					
					 Thanks to their devoted efforts, the reconstruction of dozens of tunnels was brought to a qualitative completion.
					
					 Now they are putting spurs to rounding off the reconstruction of overall railways in the northern part of the country at an early date.

articles.title: Songi Mushroom Good for Health
articles.content:
Songi Mushroom Good for Health
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Pine forests of scenic Mt. Chilbo in North Hamgyong Province, the DPRK, are abundant in Songi mushroom (Tricholoma matsutake) well known at home and abroad.
					 Songi mushroom of Mt. Chilbo is peculiar in flavor, taste and soft fiber.
					
					 The mushroom is 8 to 20 cm across in its flat cap and 10 to 20 cm high in stipe when it reaches its full growth. The cap is of brown color, getting darker towards its center.
					
					 As it is very rich in protein and anti-carcinogenic substances, it has widely been accepted for the treatment of heart, liver and bronchus diseases.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il sent quantities of Songi mushroom gathered in Mt. Chilbo as gifts to Kim Dae Jung, former south Korean president, and his entourage and south Korean pressmen who visited Pyongyang in Juche 89 (2000), on the occasion of the Harvest Moon Day that year.
					
					 Its gathering season in the mountain covers days from mid-August to early October.

articles.title: U.S. Is Arch Criminal Creating Regional Instability: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Is Arch Criminal Creating Regional Instability: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is steadily escalating military tensions on the Korean Peninsula and in the Asia-Pacific region.
					 It is pushing ahead with its plan to additionally deploy latest nuclear carriers and destroyers in the Asia-Pacific region. Prior to it, an aerial reconnaissance unit of the U.S. Army consisting of 30 armed reconnaissance planes was deployed at the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek, south Korea on a rotation basis.
					
					 At a world security forum the U.S. secretary of Defense cried out for maintaining posture to cope with the "threat" from the DPRK. Are evermore frequent U.S. military moves for the regional peace and stability?
					
					 The world is now expressing deep concern over the U.S. pivot to Asia-Pacific policy.
					
					 The Asia-Pacific region is the center of the political, economic and military forces in the 21st century.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to realize its strategy for world supremacy in the new century by preempting actions in this region.
					
					 It is directing the spearhead of its attack to the Korean Peninsula and regarding south Korea as a military and strategic advanced base in order to carry out its Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 U.S. task forces including nuclear carriers are being amassed around the peninsula and U.S.-led war drills against the DPRK are becoming frequent.
					
					 The forward-deployment of the U.S. forces around the peninsula pursuant to its strategy for invading the DPRK and frantic war maneuvers are driving the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 The peninsula is fraught with the greatest danger of war in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The escalating tension on the peninsula is leading to the increasing tension in the Asia-Pacific region and military actions on the peninsula are bound to spark off greater danger of war in the region.
					
					 It is nonsensical to ease the regional situation without defusing the tension on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is not qualified to talk about the regional peace and security as it is seeking to establish a sphere of military domination in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once the act of wrecking peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the Asian region and creating military threats and the danger of war in all parts of the world through persistent hostile moves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Removing Confrontation between North, South
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Removing Confrontation between North, South
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- To defuse confrontation between the north and the south of Korea is an important issue for the country's reunification and the prerequisite to independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Friday.
					
					 Seeking confrontation while escalating confrontation with compatriots is a treacherous crime disturbing reconciliation and unity of the nation, pushing the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe and barring national reunification, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The differing ideologies and social systems exist in the north and the south due to the national division but they are not the cause of distrust and confrontation between fellow countrymen. Distrust will grow deeper, confrontation will be escalated and national reconciliation and unity will never be achieved if one antagonizes fellow countrymen while resorting to one's own ism narrow-mindedly, indifferent to great common interests for national reunification.
					
					 National reunification is not for the interests of one side but for those of all Koreans and for the nation's uniform development and co-prosperity.
					
					 It is a tragedy that human and material resources have drained in vain and uniform development of the nation delayed due to the division of the country. Distrust and confrontation between the north and the south will bring nothing.
					
					 Persistent inter-Korean confrontation makes it impossible to achieve peace of the country and remove the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 In order to defuse confrontation between the north and south and mend inter-Korean relations it is important to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. It is quite illogical to talk about the improved inter-Korean relations without implementing the two declarations. When the declarations are respected and sincerely implemented, the inter-Korean relations will be mended and peace and reunification of the country be achieved.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Rebukes Park Geun Hye for Her Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Rebukes Park Geun Hye for Her Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary rebukes Park Geun Hye of south Korea for revealing her attempt at the confrontation with the DPRK during her trip to European countries, crying for the "north's abandonment of nuclear program" and "human rights". 
					 What Park said and did showed her intention to make a showdown with the DPRK to the last with the backing of outside forces in disregard of national reconciliation and unity, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 As proved by the past inter-Korean relations, confrontation between the fellow countrymen will bring a war only. 
					
					 However, Park is openly revealing her attempt at confrontation with the DPRK, while raising the "settlement of the north's nuclear issue" as a main task, far from drawing a lesson from the "policy toward the north" the failure of which has already been clear and opting for improving the north-south relations as required by all Koreans. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is going frantic in the moves for escalating confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with outside forces, vociferating about the "north's abandonment of nuclear program" and "human rights". Lurking behind this is a sinister ploy to tarnish the image of the DPRK and thus arrest its army and people from advancing under the uplifted banner of independence, Songun and socialism and realize the ambition for aggression of the north and confrontation of social systems. 
					
					 But the group is seriously mistaken. Cooperation with outsiders against the DPRK will invite condemnation only from the fellow countrymen. Those who run amuck to hurt the fellow countrymen by relying on outside forces will face a stern judgment by history, forsaken by the nation. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye would be well advised to cogitate about what kind of misfortune she will meet for her reckless act.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue Related to Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue Related to Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1100th Wednesday rally outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Nov. 13 in demand of the settlement of the issue related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					 Speakers said rallies have been held to settle the sexual slavery issue in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul on every Wednesday since January 8, 1992. 
					
					 Japan is speeding up the preparations for a war of aggression, far from sincerely reflecting on the crimes including sexual slavery, they said, and went on:
					
					 The solution of the issue of sexual slavery is to protect the rights of women. We all should struggle to prevent the descendants from suffering such violence as sexual slavery. 
					
					 The speakers urged the present "government" to opt for forcing Japan to make an apology and reparation for the sexual slavery as early as possible. 
					
					 A statement was read out at the rally. 
					
					 It said that the Japanese government is shamelessly beautifying the war crimes and busy with the moves for militarism, taking its back away from the solution to the sexual slavery issue. 
					
					 The statement said the south Korean regime's silence hurts the victims and such regime is undesirable.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Pro-Japanese Act Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Pro-Japanese Act Assailed
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Friday in a commentary condemns the south Korean authorities for recognizing Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense".
					 This is an unpardonable pro-Japanese act of selling off the dignity of the nation, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation. Japanese imperialists illegally occupied Korea early in the past century and inflicted unspeakable pain and misfortune on the Korean nation, pursuing the most barbarous colonial rule for more than 40 years.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, however, are justifying their colonial rule while distorting the history of aggression, far from making an apology and reparation. Worse still, they are openly revealing their attempt at the aggression of Korea, claiming that Tok Islets, part of the inalienable territory of Korea, belong to them. Accordingly, recognizing their exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" can never be pardoned under any circumstances as it is a treacherous act of opening the way of their overseas aggression.
					
					 We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that such treacherous crimes are being committed as part of the moves to build the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance.
					
					 By recognizing Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" the U.S. is seeking to lessen its financial burden caused by its huge military expenditure and keep Japan under its control.  
					
					 Meanwhile, Japan is making desperate efforts to tighten military nexus with the south Korean puppet forces and realize its ambition for overseas aggression with the U.S. backing.
					
					 The puppet forces are seeking to round off the triangular military alliance and do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north by relying on outside forces.
					
					 The whole nation can never escape disaster as long as there are the quislings leaving no stone untried to do harm to fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Disturbing Investigation into IS Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Disturbing Investigation into IS Case
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Nov. 12 posted an editorial accusing the south Korean regime of disturbing the investigation into the case of the puppet Intelligence Service's (IS) illegal interference in the election.
					 The editorial recalled that on Nov. 11 the supreme prosecutor's office took heavy disciplinary and disciplinary measures against Yun Sok Yol and Pak Hyong Chol who were in charge of special investigation into the IS case, claiming that they investigated the case in favor of the opposition party, without the command of the superior.
					
					 It condemned the prosecution for snubbing the outside pressure upon the investigation disclosed by Yun.
					
					 The special investigation into the case collapsed, it noted, adding: This again confirms the essence of the IS case.
					
					 Park Geun Hye said that she would make clear the suspicion on the power organs' involvement in the past election according to law and on the principle and call those involved to account if any. But the IS has not been punished for its illegal acts.
					
					 After all, it has been clearly confirmed that the present "government" concealed the IS's interference in the election and defended its crime.
					
					 If the "government" brushes aside even the special investigation for probing the truth behind the IS case, it will never escape the final judgment by people, the editorial warned.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Confirms Validity of Socialism: British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Confirms Validity of Socialism: British Organizations
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Nov. 1, the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science".
					 The statement said:
					
					 This precious work refutes sophism of the ferocious imperialists advertising that socialism had already gone bankrupt. It clearly clarifies the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism.
					
					 It also gives great strength and courage to the world revolutionary people and fresh vigor to the socialist movement.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, frustrated sophism of the modern revisionists and indicated the bright way of victory for progressive people aspiring after socialism.
					
					 The work fully confirms the validity of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Serbia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Serbia
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated by the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia on November 8.
					 The general secretary of the party was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from December 1 to 20 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to introduce the revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: British Organizations Oppose S. Korean Chief Executive's Visit to UK
articles.content:
British Organizations Oppose S. Korean Chief Executive's Visit to UK
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Nov. 5 posted on their websites an article opposing the south Korean puppet chief executive's visit to the UK.
					 Park Geun Hye illegally took power through the Intelligence Service and other power organs' interference in the election, the article said, adding:
					
					 South Korea has long stained with the blood of the people.
					
					 Park represents the interests of the rich, one percent of the population, not of the working people in south Korea.
					
					 South Korea is not an independent country but a colony of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. forces still remain in south Korea, having the right to command the wartime operation although they have committed all sorts of crimes there.
					
					 This fact is enough to show that south Korea is a U.S. colony without any sovereignty.
					
					 South Korea is totally subordinated to the U.S. in all fields. It is also shackled to Japan.
					
					 Its economy is directly dominated by foreign capital.
					
					 Fascist and puppet chief executive Park Geun Hye can not be welcomed by the British people.

articles.title: Departamento de Politica de CDN condena reciente visita al extranjero de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Departamento de Politica de CDN condena reciente visita al extranjero de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El vocero del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica la vispera una nota condenando la reciente visita a ultramar de Park Geun-hye que demostro su naturaleza de traidora servil a grandes potencias y maniaca de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					Tan pronto como tomara la posesion, la presidenta titere surcoreana Park Geun-hye visito Estados Unidos y otros paises y realizo del 2 al 9 de este mes una gira por los paises de Europa occidental, comienza el texto y prosigue:
					
					Durante su estancia en Europa occidental, otro lado de la Tierra, volvio a reclamar con ansia la "renuncia de armas nucleares" de la RPDC.
					
					Las armas nucleares y los misiles de la RPDC son poderoso disuasivo para prevenir los desastres de guerra nuclear que quiere provocar EE.UU. y un medio de autodefensa para salvaguardar el destino del pais y la nacion.
					
					La independencia y la dignidad estan por encima de la nacion.
					
					Imponer a la RPDC a cancelar las armas nucleares y misiles da lo mismo que exigirle que viva como esclava del imperialismo sin ninguna independencia y dignidad.
					
					Pasa lo mismo en las expresiones de Park tales como la "opcion correcta" y el "verdadero cambio".
					
					Lo que deseamos no es la vistosa democracia ni la economia del mercado por el estilo norteamericano basada en la ley de selva.
					
					El camino a seguir por la RPDC es el de independencia, autarquia y autodefensa que concede primacia a los intereses de la nacion.
					
					Trazar la politica acorde a ello y ejecutarla constituyen la opcion mas correcta y el verdadero cambio que desean todos los connacionales.
					
					Tanto ayer como hoy, el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC continuan solucionando independientemente las relaciones intercoreanas en el principio de dar prioridad a la nacion.
					
					Park es quien debe tomar la opcion correcta y la paz verdadera.
					
					En visperas de su viaje a Europa occidental, Park menciono la "cumbre Norte-Sur" para elevar su popularidad.
					
					Parece que asi quiso fingirse interesada en el alivio de tension de la Peninsula Coreana y el futuro de relaciones intercoreanas, pero no tuvo otro resultado que mostrar su baja personalidad.
					
					La cumbre Norte-Sur es un hito importante para la unidad nacional y un espacio para lograr la reunificacion pacifica.
					
					Es natural que no salgan palabras convenientes a los intereses nacionales de la mente de ella que considera la hostilidad como "confianza" y la confrontacion como "principio".
					
					En su anterior visita a EE.UU. realizada en mayo pasado y su gira por los paises perifericos y del Sudeste Asiatico, Park revelo su naturaleza de vendepatria servil a grandes potencias y maniaca de enfrentamiento.
					
					El anacronico acto traidor de dar espaldas a la nacion y adular a las fuerzas foraneas acelerara el efecto de estrangulacion.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, el Departamento de Politica del CDN de la RPDC vuelve a aconsejar seriamente a Park Geun-hye y sus compinches.
					
					Primero, no deben cuestionar mas las armas nucleares de la RPDC y su linea de impulsar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Tanto mas repita a toda voz lo que dicta su amo norteamericano, cuanto mas se agrandaran sus crimenes de vendepatrias serviles a grandes potencias y maniacos de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					Deben darse clara cuenta de que no hay criados politicos mas miserables que los que viven dejandose llevar por otros.
					
					Segundo, no deben portarse atrevidamente diciendo que inducen  el "cambio" de alguien.
					
					Nuestro pueblo, que ve el horizonte de su futuro de prosperidad, realiza todos los deseos y suenos de nuestra nacion con gran fe marchando por el sendero optado.
					
					Los que deben "cambiarse" son Park Geun-hye y sus seguidores que cayeron en el pantano llamado "Yusin" (renovacion).
					
					Park debe tener presente que desde hace mucho tiempo, el pueblo surcoreano va transformando la sociedad surcoreana siguiendo el ejemplo de la RPDC y apartandose del camino de servilismo a grandes potencias y traicion a la patria.
					
					Tercero, si ella quiere construir la confianza y ser tratada como "jefa de Estado", debe actuar con prudencia volviendose en si.
					
					El trato a alguien se ajusta a sus acciones.
					
					Antes de mencionar la "anulacion de promesa" por alguien, ella debe saber que se construira la confianza verdadera cuando respete todas las declaraciones conjuntas intercoreanas y los acuerdos derivados de ellas, conquistas comunes de la nacion, y sera tratada bien si deja de charlatanear calumniando a alguien.
					
					Park y sus compinches deben recobrar el juicio antes de que se haga tarde.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC observaran el movimiento posterior de aquellos.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza demagogia de fuerzas hostiles a RPDC en cuanto a problema siriaco
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza demagogia de fuerzas hostiles a RPDC en cuanto a problema siriaco
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC hecha en relacion con que se divulga la desinformacion de que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea toma parte en operaciones militares de Siria, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la vispera la siguiente respuesta:
					En estos dias, algunas fuentes extranjeras propagan los datos falsos de que la RPDC ofrece a Siria los equipos militares y de que pilotos coreanos participan directamente en el ataque aereo al ejercito insurgente.
					
					Esto deviene una parte de artimanas absurdas de las fuerzas hostiles a la RPDC para denigrar la imagen pacifica de esta y encubrir los crimenes de ellos que obstaculizan la solucion pacifica de la situacion de Siria.
					
					La RPDC se mantiene en la posicion invariable de que la situacion de Siria debe ser solucionada pronto por via pacifica de acuerdo con los intereses de los siriacos y mediante el dialogo y negociaciones en el principio de asegurar la soberania y la integracion territorial, sin injerencia extranjera.

articles.title: CRPP condena "2o plan basico de desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte" de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP condena "2o plan basico de desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte" de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica la vispera la informacion no. 1051 para condenar el "2o plan basico de desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte" de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					Recientemente, el Ministerio titere de Unificacion definio por fin el "2o plan basico de desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte", que estipula el rumbo de la "politica sobre el Norte (de Corea)" a ser ejecutada por el actual "gobierno" en el proximo lustro, y lo sometio a la consideracion de la "Asamblea Nacional", revela la nota y continua:
					
					El plan contiene la "solucion del problema nuclear del Norte" como tarea principal, la institucion de la "ley de derechos humanos del Norte", la asistencia a los "fugitivos norcoreanos" y otras cosas malignas.
					
					Y excluyo el contenido sobre el establecimiento de la zona especial para la paz y cooperacion en el Mar Oeste de Corea, la sustitucion del sistema de armisticio por el convenio de paz y otros que estaban incluidos en el "1o plan basico de desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte", trazado en 2007 durante el mandato del "gobierno" de Roh Moo Hyun.
					
					El hecho puso al desnudo la intencion del gobierno surcoreano de enfrentarse con la RPDC hasta el fin de su mandato.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas tacharon todos los contenidos referentes a la ejecucion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y a su vez insertaron las palabras del "problema nuclear" y el "problema de derechos humanos", lo cual significa negar totalmente las declaraciones intercoreanas y deviene una provocacion intolerable anti-RPDC.
					
					El "2o plan basico de desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte" no es el plan para el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas sino el plan de rompimiento y confrontacion.
					
					Para desviar la censura de opiniones internas y externas, la banda titere se refiere en el supuesto "plan" a la "revision de reanudacion de cooperacion economica Sur-Norte y el permiso sobre la inversion  en el Norte".
					
					Deviene una burla a las opiniones internas y externas hablar del desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas congelando todas las relaciones Norte-Sur y entregandose a la confrontacion y las maniobras belicas.
					
					La banda titere debe invalidar totalmente el malsano "plan" arriba citado y abolir radicalmente su politica de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Si los titeres surcoreanos siguen aferrandose a la confrontacion fratricida pese a las reiteradas advertencias nuestras, sufriran el fin vergonzoso como el traidor Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion coreana insiste en la reforma de UNESCO
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion coreana insiste en la reforma de UNESCO
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El dia 9, el jefe de la delegacion coreana intervino en el 37o periodo de sesiones de la asamblea general de la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para la Educacion, la Ciencia y la Cultura (UNESCO).
					Recordo que el ideal estipulado en la carta de la fundacion de la UNESCO fue construir un mundo pacifico libre de guerra y lograr la prosperidad y desarrollo comunes de la humanidad basados en la unidad y cooperacion intelectuales y morales.
					
					El ideal de la UNESCO no se ha realizado todavia aunque transcurrio ya la primera decada del nuevo siglo, dijo el y continuo:
					
					Reformar la UNESCO se presenta como problema impostergable para alcanzar las metas centrales de las actividades de la organizacion en el nuevo siglo y en las circunstancias cambiadas de hoy.
					
					La reforma debe llevarse a cabo en el principio de mantener cabalmente el liderazgo internacional de la UNESCO y garantizar su independencia y caracter original como organizacion intelectual.
					
					La ensenanza, primera rama de la UNESCO, ocupa posicion muy importante en lograr la paz mundial y la prosperidad comun y desarrollo sostenible de la humanidad.
					
					En los debates de la presente asamblea general, relacionada con la etapa preparatoria de establecimiento de metas de desarrollo de educacion para el periodo posterior a 2015, se debe dar importancia a los asuntos como establecer las metas realistas por etapas para el desarrollo de ensenanza secundaria y superior a base de la intensificacion de la primaria, aumentar el apoyo a los paises en vias de desarrollo, etc. y tambien hay que prever la discusion sobre las medidas practicas para su alcance.
					
					Ademas, la UNESCO debera esforzarse mas por garantizar la diversidad cultural y fomentar el entendimiento mutuo y amistad entre los paises y regiones a traves del dialogo y cooperacion entre diferentes culturas e iglesias.
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fortalecera y desarrollara mas en el futuro tambien las relaciones de cooperacion con la UNESCO y todos sus miembros segun el ideal de su politica exterior basado en la independencia, la paz y la amistad y se sumara activamente a los esfuerzos internacionales por la paz mundial y la prosperidad comun de la humanidad.

articles.title: EE.UU. es culpable de inestabilidad regional, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. es culpable de inestabilidad regional, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos sigue exacerbando la tension militar de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					Acelera en esta region la ubicacion adicional de los portaaviones nucleares y buques destructores. 
					
					Ya fue emplazado en la base de tropas norteamericanas de Phyongthaek del Sur de Corea una unidad de reconocimiento aereo de las fuerzas terrestres norteamericanas compuesta por 30 aviones de reconocimiento. 
					
					El secretario de Defensa norteamericano insistio en el Forum Internacional de Seguridad en la necesidad de tomar la disposicion frente a la "amenaza" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Hoy dia, el mundo expresa gran preocupacion por la politica norteamericana de dar importancia a la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					El centro de las fuerzas politicas, economicas y militares del siglo XXI es la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					EE.UU. pretende tomar las medidas anticipadas en esta region para lograr la estrategia de supremacia mundial de nueva centuria. 
					
					Para ese fin, dirige la flecha de ataque a la Peninsula Coreana y considera el suelo surcoreano como base avanzada militar y estrategica. 
					
					Se emplazan concentradamente en el contorno de la Peninsula Coreana el portaaviones y otros armamentos de ataque movil norteamericanos y se libran con frecuencia los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC bajo el mando de EE.UU. 
					
					La ubicacion avanzada de armas norteamericanas en torno a la Peninsula Coreana y los freneticos ejercicios belicos llevan al borde de guerra la situacion tensa de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Ahora esta peninsula asiatica se considera como zona mas candente en la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					La agravacion de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana significa la tension de la region de Asia-Pacifico y las acciones militares en la esta Peninsula aumentan el peligro de guerra en la region. 
					
					Es ilogico mejorar la situacion regional sin aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					EE.UU., que se desespera por tomar la hegemonia militar sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico, no tiene la calificacion de hablar de la paz y seguridad de la region. 
					
					El imperio debe parar de inmediato los actos hostiles que perturban la paz y la estabilidad de la region asiatica inclusive la Peninsula Coreana y crean la amenaza militar y el peligro de guerra por doquier del mundo.

articles.title: Aumento armamentista del Sur de Corea agrava tension regional, comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Aumento armamentista del Sur de Corea agrava tension regional, comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Pasa el limite alarmante el aumento armamentista de los belicistas surcoreanos. 
					Intentan comprar de su amo norteamericano los aviones de combate ultramodernos, los sistemas antimisiles THAAD, el misil Patriot y otros armamentos.
					
					Determinaron la compra de aviones sin piloto Global Hawk y abogan por poseer hasta los aviones nodrizas y portaaviones. 
					
					Esos pasos, que parten del plan para poner en practica la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" aprobada entre EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, perturban la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y agravan la situacion regional. 
					
					Los medios de guerra sofisticados que intentan comprar los titeres surcoreanos tienen un alcance mucho mas lejano que la Peninsula Coreana en su teatro operacional, lo cual desmiente su pretexto de "para hacer frente a la amenaza de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte de Corea". 
					
					El THAAD es el sistema de interceptacion desarrollado para destruir los objetos volantes fuera de la atmosfera. Y Global Hawk tiene un radio operacional de miles de kilometros. 
					
					Basta de hablar del alcance global de aviones nodrizas y de portaaviones. 
					
					Lo problematico es que el aumento armamentista del Sur de Corea consuena con las maniobras de EE.UU. tendentes a tomar la supremacia militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Ahora el imperio da mas acicate que nunca al establecimiento del sistema de defensa antimisil y otras maniobras militares para realizar su estrategia de dominar a Asia, provocando la precaucion y rechazo de los pueblos asiaticos. 
					
					EE.UU. utiliza a los titeres surcoreanos enloquecidos por la confrontacion fratricida para apaciguar la resistencia regional y perseguir su invariable meta. 
					
					Pues, los armamentos norteamericanos que se introduciran en el suelo surcoreano se utilizaran para la incorporacion del Sur de Corea al sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. y para el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC. 
					
					En fin de cuentas, la compra de armamentos sofisticados del Sur de Corea es un acto fratricida e intolerable crimen que ofrece a EE.UU. la base regional y medios necesarios al dominio de Asia. 
					
					Hoy dia, el mundo denuncia el aumento armamentista del Sur de Corea como una tonteria que apoya tal estrategia norteamericana gastando el dinero propio.
					
					En la region asiatica donde estan concentradas las potencias nucleares, cualquier minimo conflicto local puede extenderse en un instante a la guerra nuclear y la mundial. 
					
					La camarilla de Park Geun-hye es la horda de lacayos de guerra nuclear y la brigada de choque que ejecuta la estrategia norteamericana de tomar la hegemonia sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico.
